params.right_statement: The author writes as if this issue requires collective action by many people (e.g. by government)
params.left_statement: The author writes as if individuals can deal with this issue on their own.
params.header_text:
What type of response does the article suggest this topic requires?
(If more than one response applies, choose the response closest to the bottom.)
answer_array: No response. This article is informative, but doesn't require a response.
Individual response. The article is about an issue that individuals can deal with on their own.
Group response. The article is about an issue that requires a response by groups other than the government.
Governmental response. The article is about an issue that requires a response by government.

params.header_text: Notes

Instructions

params.header_text: Is the content of this document clear enough for coders to code?

answer_array: It contains odd formatting, such as extra line breaks.
It is incomplete (missing text in the document).
It contains less than 3 paragraphs of text.

The text comes from more than one article.
